summary: The Senate Gift Shop sells gift items to members of the Senate, their staff, and the public. As part of our role in helping Congress oversee its own funds, we performed certain procedures that were requested on behalf of the Secretary of the Senate. We compared a sample of the Gift Shop's FY 2020 receipts and purchases to deposits, invoices, and certain other Gift Shop...
title: Senate Gift Shop Revolving Fund: Procedures Related to FY 2020 Receipts and Disbursements
